sentences.en: A plan with a lack of money and uses meant a standstill, but the outside of the star-shaped building is now like a memory of a deceased person.
sentences.cn: 一个计划同时缺乏金钱和吸引力就意味着将永远停滞，但这些外星状的建设现在却宛如是对已故人的一种怀念。

sentences.en: Half of California's deceased opt for cremation.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚州有一半的亡故者选择火葬。

sentences.en: He conceived it his duty to help his deceased friend's family.
sentences.cn: 他认为帮助亡友的家属是他的责任.

sentences.en: He feared the soul of his deceased wife would haunt him.
sentences.cn: 他害怕亡妻的鬼魂会来缠扰他.

sentences.en: His mother is now sadly deceased.
I wish I knew why I feel such loyalty to the deceased.
sentences.cn: 我真想知道我何以对死者如此忠诚不渝.

sentences.en: Let us not bear hard upon the weaknesses of the deceased.
sentences.cn: 我们不必过分强调死者的弱点.

sentences.en: Maybe even his deceased parents had interceded in his behalf.
sentences.cn: 也许他那去世的父母都在为他调停.

sentences.en: The deceased died of old age.
The deceased general was a great soldier.
sentences.cn: 这位已故的将军曾是一位伟大的战士.

sentences.en: The deceased were both killed with the same knife.
sentences.cn: 两个死者是被同一把刀刺死的.

sentences.en: The identities of the deceased have now been determined.
sentences.cn: 死者的身份现在已经确定。

sentences.en: The property of a deceased person should remain in the gens.
sentences.cn: 死者遗产必须保存在本氏族之内.

sentences.en: The property should be inherited by the children of the deceased owner.
sentences.cn: 遗产必须由死者的子女继承.

sentences.en: We all wept in silence for the deceased.
sentences.cn: 我们都默默为死者哀悼.

trans.tran_en: someone who has died, especially recently

trans.tran_cn: 死，死亡(decease的过去式和过去分词)
